text_block_list.text:
Boop boop. 
Boop beep boop boop. 
Beep boop beep beep.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
"DEON" is『Zenno Rob Roy』. 
"Downlink", "downlink"――
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
Is "communication" impossible『because Neo Universe is an 
alien』? "Rejection". "Reattempt". To overcome "4.2 light years". 
"TIFY"――
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: ――I'd like to see the very same sights as you, someday.
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
(Zenno Rob Roy stated a desire to『see』. 
The same [*sights*] as Neo Universe. 
"THRF" Zenno Rob Roy will certainly...)
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
――Uni-san! 
I, um... I want to――
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: Requesting to『go out』. With Zenno Rob Roy.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: Huh?
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
Neo Universe will complete "transmission". Through words or 
through "PYSC".  "Repeating attempts" until the『connection』is 
made. So――
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: 『Go out』 with Neo Universe!
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
Go out... 
O-of course, gladly! Let's give it another shot!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
Wow... This place has such a lovely energy! 
Are these... charms? Oh, they have some based on books!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
『Fond』 of them? 
"MTO".『Order-making』 is available.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
I... I am fond of them! 
They're just the kind of thing I like. Especially these adorable 
book charms...
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: Copy. Zenno Rob Roy, "stand by".
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: I-is this for...
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
"GIVU"―― 『Matching』『presents』. 
Please 『accept』 this.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
Zenno Rob Roy gave 『joy』. 
By "attempting" to 『see』 the the same [*world*] as Neo 
Universe.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
That's why... They 『match』. If we both "carry" them, we can 
feel like we are in the same [*world*]...
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: I, I, um...... Thank you so much!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
It all makes me so happy. The charm, the fact that they match, 
your feelings......And the thought of sharing a world with you, 
Uni-san.
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
――! "Communication" success...! 
Then... Then is a "rendezvous" at the 『Moon Viewing Social』 
possible?
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
Neo Universe wants to 『be there』 for Zenno Rob Roy. 
So please...  allow for 『support』. 
At the 『Moon Viewing Social』, too.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: ――I'd be delighted.
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
Thank you. ...I wanted to tell you that today. 
I want to thank you for the kindness you've given me until now, 
and to accept all the kindness you'll give me in the future.
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
――! 
"Mutev".  Neo Universe will『be at your side』.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
『Moon Viewing Party』 has a  "PRIVE"『dress code』. 
"THRF" the next destination will be a『boutique』.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: Oh, that's right... I suppose it is common to wear new outfits to dinner parties...
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
...Er, if that's the case... would you indulge me in one small 
thing?
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
Seeing as we're going in together, I'd like you to pick out my 
clothes. I want to feel closer to your world...
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
Affirmative! 
Neo Universe also wants to 『feel』 Zenno Rob Roy's world.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
...! 
Then... we'll pick out each others' outfits!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: Do you need any help with putting things on~?
text_block_list.name: Boutique Clerk

text_block_list.text: N-no, I'm all right, thank you...!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: Neo Universe is also "JST".
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: Wow, the two of you match perfectly~!
text_block_list.name: Boutique Clerk

text_block_list.text:
Oh, I have an idea! While I have you here, would you be 
interested in doing your hair? We sell hats and accessories, too~!
text_block_list.name: Boutique Clerk

text_block_list.text:
...! 
Neo Universe "wants" to try a『French braid』.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: Th-then I'll... Try letting my hair down, maybe...
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: There we go... What do you think?
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: Sphira. Zenno Rob Roy's "vision"...... Is『beloved』.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
Heehee. It's like we've switched styles. I'm still a bit 
uncomfortable having my hair down but... You look amazing in 
braids, Uni-san.
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: "Mutev".  "Loadout" for the『Moon Viewing Social』is locked in.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: ――The morning of the『Moon Viewing Social』.
All right then, let's start the group training.
text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki

text_block_list.text:
If you need anything, just give me or one of the girls on the 
committee a shout. Take a break whenever you need it, and make 
sure you're ready to head out when 6PM rolls around.
text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki

text_block_list.text:
"Supplies" at the ready. 
『Aid』will be "provided" flawlessly.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: Right. Thank you for all the support you'll give me today!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
...... 
――Okay, everyone, get out there and work hard!
text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
